DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetics of sarpogrelate controlled-release formulation (CR) in comparison to immediate-release formulation (IR) and Food effect on the pharmacokinetics of sarpogrelate CR.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics and Food Effect of Sarpogrelate HCl CR Formulation in Comparison to Immediate-release Formulation
DOC.criteria: 20 to 55 years of healthy volunteers Hypersensitivity Reaction about Sarpogrelate HCl or other antiplatelets
